testCase.bodyParameters:
topic = Fault
Message type of Event = Alarm
Alarm.objectName = { (MD=md1; ME=me1; PTP=ptp1) }
Alarm.objectType = OT_PHYSICAL_TERMINATION_POINT
testCase.description: The EMS OS sends a notification to the BrokerOS. Two OS have subscribed to receive this notification.

postconditions.success: The two OS that have subscribed to receive this notification receive it.
postconditions.failure: One or both of the two OS that have subscribed to receive this notification do not receive it.

tests.comments:
CommunicationPattern = SimpleResponse
CommunicationStyle = MSG
Only the tested parameters are represented.
